page.title: 17Farming in Priors Marston
page.content: {Manor Farm.}800 acres. Run by Manager. Heavy lias clay, now drained. Arable - winter wheat & barley, rape; winter beans as protein cattle food. 3 men; all live tied houses, Priors M. Highly mechanised; 3 Renault tractors, International combine. All planting is combine drilled. Chemical weed & pest control put on by helicopters & ground sprayers. Stubble burning. No organic fertilisers. {Grange Farm.}400 acres. Lias clay soil Sheep, 420 mule ewes. Cattle, young females reared for own dairy herd. Barley grown & fed to livestock. 3 men; 2 live in Priors Marston. Massey Ferguson tractors. {Shutwell Farm.}187 acres. One man + student at harvest time. Whole farm barley except 10 acres sheep. Farm runs along base of hill & house fed by spring water.
